title: Why rent cloud storage? Own 2TB for life for just $70.
description: This user-friendly platform makes it simple for anyone to manage their digital assets. Save on a 2TB lifetime FileJump cloud storage plan. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: This user-friendly platform makes it simple for anyone to manage their digital assets. Save on a 2TB lifetime FileJump cloud storage plan.
text: Daily deals Make the smart investment today with FileJump’s 2TB lifetime subscription for $89 and enjoy secure, hassle-free storage for life. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals We all know subscription fees multiply like rascally rabbits. Wouldn’t it be nice to have cloud storage that doesn’t add to the misery? FileJump offers a refreshing alternative. Why rent your cloud storage month after month when you can score 2TB of cloud space for just $69.97 for life? Use code FILE5 at checkout to get this exclusive discount from Cult of Mac Deals (available through February 2). No more recurring payments or surprise fees. Just a one-time investment for a lifetime of secure, accessible cloud storage. FileJump deal: Get 2TB of cloud storage for life for just $70 With 2TB of storage, you’ll have room for around 500,000 documents, thousands of photos and videos, or all the work files you’ll probably ever need. Whether you’re a creative professional, a small-business owner or someone with a massive digital collection, this cloud storage deal will cover you for years to come. This is particularly great for freelancers and anyone else looking to cut down on recurring costs. Plus, it’s a fantastic value compared to competitors that charge far more for less storage space or short-term access. (We’re looking at you, iCloud+.) Drag and drop for easy file management FileJump makes managing your files super-easy with its drag-and-drop interface. Just drag your files into your browser, and they instantly upload to your secure cloud space. FileJump’s user-friendly platform makes it simple for anyone to manage their digital assets — even if you’re not a tech expert. And security? FileJump offers 256-bit AES encryption, keeping your data safe from unauthorized access. Plus, you can access your files from anywhere, on any device. Whether at home, in the office or on the go, your files are always easily accessible. Unlike some cloud services that throttle your download speeds or limit your access, FileJump offers unlimited downloads and no limits on transfer speeds. That means you can upload, download and share files as much as you want without worrying about hitting any caps. If you need to share files — whether you need to send them to clients, share family photos or collaborate with colleagues — FileJump makes that easy, too. You can share files and folders via simple links. Or you can set up free accounts for others to access and collaborate on projects. It’s a powerful feature that turns FileJump into more than just a storage solution. Save on 2TB of cloud storage from FileJump Make the smart investment today with FileJump’s 2TB lifetime subscription for $69.97 with code FILE5 through February 2, 2025. That’s an 85% discount off the regular price of $467. Then you can sit back and enjoy secure, hassle-free cloud storage for life — without additional fees. html:
• Daily deals

We all know subscription fees multiply like rascally rabbits. Wouldn’t it be nice to have cloud storage that doesn’t add to the misery? FileJump offers a refreshing alternative. Why rent your cloud storage month after month when you can score 2TB of cloud space for just $69.97 for life? Use code FILE5 at checkout to get this exclusive discount from Cult of Mac Deals (available through February 2).

No more recurring payments or surprise fees. Just a one-time investment for a lifetime of secure, accessible cloud storage.

FileJump deal: Get 2TB of cloud storage for life for just $70

With 2TB of storage, you’ll have room for around 500,000 documents, thousands of photos and videos, or all the work files you’ll probably ever need. Whether you’re a creative professional, a small-business owner or someone with a massive digital collection, this cloud storage deal will cover you for years to come.

This is particularly great for freelancers and anyone else looking to cut down on recurring costs. Plus, it’s a fantastic value compared to competitors that charge far more for less storage space or short-term access. (We’re looking at you, iCloud+.)

Drag and drop for easy file management

FileJump makes managing your files super-easy with its drag-and-drop interface. Just drag your files into your browser, and they instantly upload to your secure cloud space. FileJump’s user-friendly platform makes it simple for anyone to manage their digital assets — even if you’re not a tech expert.

And security? FileJump offers 256-bit AES encryption, keeping your data safe from unauthorized access. Plus, you can access your files from anywhere, on any device. Whether at home, in the office or on the go, your files are always easily accessible.

Unlike some cloud services that throttle your download speeds or limit your access, FileJump offers unlimited downloads and no limits on transfer speeds. That means you can upload, download and share files as much as you want without worrying about hitting any caps.

If you need to share files — whether you need to send them to clients, share family photos or collaborate with colleagues — FileJump makes that easy, too. You can share files and folders via simple links. Or you can set up free accounts for others to access and collaborate on projects. It’s a powerful feature that turns FileJump into more than just a storage solution.

Save on 2TB of cloud storage from FileJump

Make the smart investment today with FileJump’s 2TB lifetime subscription for $69.97 with code FILE5 through February 2, 2025. That’s an 85% discount off the regular price of $467. Then you can sit back and enjoy secure, hassle-free cloud storage for life — without additional fees.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post on FileJump cloud storage on September 30, 2024. We updated the pricing.
